Tonga eruption’s unprecedented water vapour rapidly depleted ozone layer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tonga-eruptions-unprecedented-water-vapour-rapidly-depleted-ozone-layer/DN6JNRM54VFD3IDTN7CU3N5IBA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tonga-eruptions-unprecedented-water-vapour-rapidly-depleted-ozone-layer/DN6JNRM54VFD3IDTN7CU3N5IBA/ Jamie MortonNew findings describe another remarkable observation from last year's monster eruption. Photo / JMA
